sentences.english: Effects of salidroside on expression of ROCK in rats with liver fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 红景天甙对肝纤维化大鼠肝组织ROCK表达的影响。

sentences.english: Naturally the article supplies the production of Instant Rhedioda -Soybeen Milk Powder with reliable theoretical basis and clear practical guide.
sentences.chinese: 为速溶红景天豆奶粉的生产提供了理论与实践的指导。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a determination method of rosavin in Rhodiola rosea by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立红景天中酪萨维含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Method determination of salidroside by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用HPLC法测定红景天苷的含量。

sentences.english: See the picture dry flowers here.
sentences.chinese: 按此看红景天花饮片图。

sentences.english: Rhodiola rosea has been widely used as traditional herb medicine in China for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 近数百年以来，红景天已广泛用于中国的传统中草药。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the optimum technological conditions of preparation Salidroside.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨红景天苷的最佳制备工艺。

sentences.english: Results23 peaks existed in the HPLC fingerprint of Compound Oral Liquid of Rhodiola.
sentences.chinese: 结果标示出复方红景天口服液23个共有峰。

sentences.english: To investigate the antitumor activity and immunity enhancement of salidroside.
sentences.chinese: 研究红景天苷抗肿瘤活性及其提高免疫功能的机制。

sentences.english: Conclusion This report can be used as the reference for identification of Rhodiola crenulata(Hook. f. et Thoms)H. Ohba.
sentences.chinese: 结论本研究可作为红景天真伪鉴别的参考依据。

sentences.english: Rhodiola is the wild plant and the ideal health source.
sentences.chinese: 红景天是一种食药兼用植物，具有多种保健功能。

sentences.english: Rhodiola sachalinensis A Bor is the plant of sachalinensial section and grows mainly in high altitude area.
sentences.chinese: 红景天为景天科植物，主要生长于高海拔地区。

sentences.english: The influences of temperature on the ultrafiltration process of the extraction liquid of Rhodiola sachalinensis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了温度对高山红景天浸提液超滤过程的影响。

sentences.english: Linjiang is famed of "the home of Chinese mountain red stonecrop".
sentences.chinese: 临江被誉为“中国高山红景天之乡”。

definition: manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
altitude sickness/abbr. for 高原反應|高原反应[gao1 yuan2 fan3 ying4]
see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1 chong2 xia4 cao3]
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
